trans-unit.source: Represents the access control and audit security for a directory.
trans-unit.target: 代表存取控制和稽核安全性目錄。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The DirectorySecurity class specifies the access rights for a system directory and how access attempts are audited.
trans-unit.target: DirectorySecurity 類別指定的存取權限系統目錄，以及如何稽核存取嘗試。

trans-unit.source: This class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會表示為一組規則的存取和稽核 」 權限。

trans-unit.source: Each access rule is represented by a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> object, while each audit rule is represented by a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> object.
trans-unit.target: 每個存取規則由<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>物件，而每個稽核規則由<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: The DirectorySecurity class is an abstraction of the underlying Windows file security system.
trans-unit.target: DirectorySecurity 類別是抽象的基礎的 Windows 檔案安全性系統。

trans-unit.source: In this system, each directory has a discretionary access control list (DACL), which controls access to the directory, and a system access control list (SACL), which specifies the access control attempts that are audited.
trans-unit.target: 在此系統中，每個目錄有判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，以控制存取目錄和系統存取控制清單 (SACL)，其指定要稽核的存取控制嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> classes are abstractions of the access control entries (ACEs) that comprise DACLs and SACLs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>類別是由 Dacl 與 Sacl 組成存取控制項目 (Ace) 的抽象概念。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: The DirectorySecurity class hides many of the details of DACLs and SACLs; you do not have to worry about ACE ordering or null DACLS.
trans-unit.target: DirectorySecurity 類別會隱藏許多細節，Dacl 的 Sacl。您不必擔心 ACE 排序或 null 的 DACL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> class to retrieve, add, or change the access rules that represent the DACL and SACL of a file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>類別來擷取、 新增或變更的存取規則，表示的 DACL 和檔案的 SACL。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The following tables lists the methods you can use to access and maintain directory security.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用來存取及維護目錄安全的方法。

trans-unit.source: |Task|Methods| |----------|-------------| |Add rules|<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.AddAccessRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: |工作 |方法 | |----------|-------------| |新增規則 |<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.AddAccessRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.AddAccessRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.AddAuditRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |Remove rules|<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.RemoveAccessRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.AddAuditRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |移除規則 |<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.RemoveAccessRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.RemoveAccessRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.AddAuditRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.RemoveAuditRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |Retrieve the access control to a directory|<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.RemoveAuditRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |擷取目錄的存取控制 |<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity.RemoveAuditRule%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |Persist the access control to a directory|<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |保存到目錄的存取控制 |<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you want to create an empty <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object that is not based on an existing directory.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式，當您想要建立空白<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>不以現有的目錄為基礎的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>

trans-unit.source: You can then populate the object with access control information and apply it to a directory.
trans-unit.target: 您可以填入具有存取控制資訊的物件，並將它套用到目錄。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref> class from a specified directory using the specified values of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref>類別指定的目錄，使用指定的值從<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor retrieves the access control information for the specified directory and then creates a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object that encapsulates that information.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會擷取指定之目錄的存取控制資訊，然後建立<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>封裝該資訊的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>

trans-unit.source: You can then inspect, add, or delete the access control information for the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以檢查、 新增或刪除指定的目錄的存取控制資訊。

trans-unit.source: The location of a directory to create a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref> object from.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的目錄位置<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref> values that specifies the type of access control list (ACL) information to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref>值，指定類型的存取控制清單 (ACL) 資訊擷取。

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by .
trans-unit.target: name 參數為零長度字串、 只包含空格，或所定義的.包含一或多個無效的字元

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，（比方說，它位於未對應的磁碟機上）。

trans-unit.source: The file specified in the name parameter was not found.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的檔案 name 找不到參數。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the directory.
trans-unit.target: 開啟目錄時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: name 參數是無效的格式。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The current system account does not have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 目前的系統帳戶沒有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The directory could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到目錄。

trans-unit.source: The name parameter specified a directory that is read-only.
trans-unit.target: name 參數指定的目錄是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: -or- This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: -或者-目前的平台不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: -或者-呼叫端沒有必要的權限。
